title: Hour 1 - Tony Dungy (05-27-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Tony Dungy (05-27-20)
description:
Former NFL head coach Tony Dungy and Dan discuss Dean Blandino's comments about breaking the glass; and the roll of the sky judge. Coach Dungy tells Dan that he has never been a fan of replay.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
